title: Create a cron job with image busybox that runs every minute and writes 'date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster' to standard output. The cron job should be terminated if it successfully starts but takes more than 12 seconds to complete execution.
description: Create a cron job with image busybox that runs every minute and writes 'date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster' to standard output. The cron job should be terminated if it successfully starts but takes more than 12 seconds to complete execution.

steps: 1. kubectl create cronjob time-limited-job --image=busybox --restart=Never --dry-run=client --schedule="* * * * *" -o yaml -- /bin/sh -c 'date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster' > time-limited-job.yaml
23. - date; echo Hello from the Kubernetes cluster
